text: hwla' alyhwd 'iidha laquu aladhin amanuu qaluu blsanhm: amnna bidinikum wrswlkm almbshshar bih fi altwrat, wa'iidha khala bed hwla' almunafiqin min alyhwd 'iilaa bed qaluu fi 'inkar: athddithwn almuminin bma byan allah lakum fi altawrat min 'amr mhmd; litakun lahum alhujat ealaykum eind rabikum yawm alqyam?
